item.title: [PI] Hitpoints - Will +rep!
item.dc:creator: @AddictivePkz AddictivePkz
item.description:
@AddictivePkz wrote:

Ok well my hp is messed up… in both the stat menu and the hp orb next to minimap . In the stat menu it shows the hp i have remaining out of 1 then switches to the my total hp level then back to 1 … and in the hp orb it shows how much hp i have left but it switches from being green + full to whatever my level is… here watch this video of my problem for it to be more clear

Please Help Me - YouTube

Please help , this is my biggest concern for my server atm D;

Read full topic
